instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00875: What is 820-00875? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U7000: What is U7000? U7000 refers to the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging IC on Macbooks from 2008-2012.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
threads.message:
I can boot with this usb-c port fine w/out a battery. this port can see USB-c drive fine but doesn't charge and macOS can see the charger but it says "not charging"
I think it's either <CHIP>U3200</CHIP> or <CHIP>U7000</CHIP>.

usb-c meter say 19,72v at 0.275a which is the same as the other port.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
threads.message:
I doubt to be <CHIP>U7000</CHIP> issue, if battery is charging from <CHIP>U3100</CHIP> side.

Any history fault?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
threads.message: liquid but all area looks clean. my next guess will be smc.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
threads.message:
Is the battery charging on the other port?
In such case, can't be a problem with a common component...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
threads.message: i've give <CHIP>U3200</CHIP> a swap then report back.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
threads.message: fixed... never mind. it's then usb-c cable. still not sure why it's working on another port but not on this port. after changing usb-c cable and this port work. so strange...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> closest usb-c port is not charging.
threads.message: Be sure the terminal contacts are good on both USB-C ports.
